snippet: Already an elder statesman at 27, and with an N.B.A. championship, LeBron James is embracing his role as a leader on the United States men’s basketball team.
abstract: Miami Heat star LeBron James, already an elder statesman at age 27, and with an NBA championship, is embracing his role as a leader on the United States Olympic men’s basketball team.
lead_paragraph: Already an elder statesman at 27, and with an N.B.A. championship, LeBron James is embracing his role as a leader on the United States men’s basketball team.

headline.seo: LeBron James Embraces Olympic Leadership Role
headline.main: N.B.A. Title Adds to James’s Credibility as U.S. Team Leader
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Title Adds To James’s Credibility As U.S. Team Leader
